sentences.sContent: By 1918 he had moved away from realism again and was blending fantasy—including abstract flying figures—and cubism in his work.
sentences.sContent_eng: By 1918 he had moved away from realism again and was blending fantasy—including abstract flying figures—and cubism in his work.
sentences.sCn: 到1918年，他再次摆脱现实主义，而将幻想画的手法（包括抽象的飞行物）与立体派的风格揉合于他的作品之中。

words.tran: 立体派艺术家；立体派画家
使成立方形；使自乘二次；量…的体积

trans.tranOther: a 20th-century style of art, in which objects and people are represented by  geometric  shapes
